articles.description: “Parasite” director Bong Joon Ho will preside over the main jury of the 78th Venice Film Festival in September, marking the first time a South Korean director has been picked as the Lido’s top juror. Bong, who does not have a previous rapport with Venice, mad…

articles.title: Elvis Presley's Graceland starts $100 virtual tours of Memphis mansion - Daily Mail
articles.description: Fans who can't travel to Elvis Presley' s Graceland in Memphis can take a $100 live, virtual tour of his former home, Meditation Garden and private jet.
articles.content: Elvis Presley's Graceland is offering the chance to go 'behind the ropes' at his Memphis mansion after launching 'VIP' virtual tours for the first time as tourists stay away amidst the coronavirus pa… [+6002 chars]

articles.title: Anne Hathaway gets her first 'talk show hives' of the year while promoting heist rom-com Locked Down - Daily Mail
articles.description: She's suffered the stress-induced rash on talk shows before, revealing some on her chest back in May of 2016, while promoting Alice Through the Looking Glass on The Ellen DeGeneres Show.
articles.content:
Anne Hathaway is no stranger to the spotlight, after 20 years in the industry.

articles.title: Siegfried Fischbacher, illusionist of Siegfried & Roy, dead at 81 - CNN
articles.description: Siegfried Fischbacher, an illusionist known for working with exotic cats as one half of Siegfried & Roy, has died from pancreatic cancer, according to his publicist Dave Kirvin.

articles.author: Scottie Andrew, CNN
articles.title: A Dolly Parton statue may be erected at the Tennessee Capitol - CNN
articles.description: A state representative proposed erecting a Dolly Parton statue that will sit on the Tennessee Capitol grounds "to recognize her for all she has contributed to this state." If it's commissioned, the Parton sculpture will face the historic Ryman Auditorium.
